member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.BaseUserControl.Database
member.summary: Returns the name of the base database for the Web Users entity (representative of database location typically used for other data as well, if configuration has different databases in use, use the AptifyApplication object to determine database location for each individual entity).
